question: A 3-digit number 4p3 is added to another 3-digit number 984 to give the four-digit number 13q7, which is divisible by 11. then, (p + q) is :

A trader mixes 26 kg of rice at Rs. 20 per kg with 30 kg of rice of other variety at Rs. 36 per kg and sells the mixture at Rs. 30 per kg. His profit percent is:

Live' started a business investing Rs. 45000. After 3 months, 'Event' joined him with a capital of Rs. 60000. After another 6 months, 'Offer' joined them with a capital of Rs. 90000. At the end of the year, they made a profit of Rs. 20000. What would be 'Offer's share in it?
optionA: Rs 4000 Answer: Option D Explanation: Just take care of the months of investment, rest all will be simple. Yogesh:Pranab:Atul = 45000*12:60000*9:90000*3 = 2:2:1 Atul's share = Rs. 20000 * (1/5) = Rs. 4000
correctAns: Ans: Rs 4000 Answer: Option D Explanation: Just take care of the months of investment, rest all will be simple. Yogesh:Pranab:Atul = 45000*12:60000*9:90000*3 = 2:2:1 Atul's share = Rs. 20000 * (1/5) = Rs. 4000
